text: Breezing Up (A Fair Wind) is an oil painting by Winslow Homer. It dates to 1873-1876. It measures 61.5 x 97 cm (24 3/16 x 38 3/16 in.) The picture hangs in the National Gallery of Art, Washington DC.Breezing Up (A Fair Wind) National Gallery of Art == References == Category:1870s paintings Category:American paintings Category:Paintings in the National Gallery of Art, Washington DC
title: Breezing Up
